quiz.question: _____ transplantation
quiz.explanation: 移植, 器官移植. The patient needed urgent organ transplantation. 患者需要紧急器官移植。

quiz.question: ______ augmentation
quiz.explanation: 增加, 预算增加. The department requested budget augmentation. 该部门要求预算增加。

quiz.question: ____ fermentation
quiz.explanation: 发酵, 葡萄酒发酵. Wine fermentation takes several weeks. 葡萄酒发酵需要几周时间。

quiz.question: _____ presentation
quiz.explanation: 演示, 销售演示. The team prepared a compelling sales presentation. 团队准备了一个引人注目的销售演示。

quiz.question: __________ misrepresentation
quiz.explanation: 歪曲, 欺诈性歪曲. The lawsuit alleged fraudulent misrepresentation. 诉讼指控欺诈性歪曲。

quiz.question: ostentation
quiz.explanation: 炫耀, 炫耀. His wealth was displayed with ostentatious ostentation. 他的财富以炫耀的方式展示。

quiz.question: ____ connotation
quiz.explanation: 含义, 词语含义. The word connotation varies by culture. 词语含义因文化而异。

quiz.question: ______ potation
quiz.explanation: 饮酒, 烈酒. He indulged in strong potation at the tavern. 他在酒馆沉溺于烈酒。

quiz.question: _____ __ temptation
quiz.explanation: 诱惑, 屈服于诱惑. Don't yield to temptation to cheat. 不要屈服于作弊的诱惑。

quiz.question: ________ dissertation
quiz.explanation: 论文, 博士论文. She defended her doctoral dissertation successfully. 她成功答辩了博士论文。

quiz.question: ____ deportation
quiz.explanation: 驱逐出境, 大规模驱逐出境. The regime ordered mass deportation of dissidents. 政权下令大规模驱逐持不同政见者。

quiz.question: _____ manifestation
quiz.explanation: 表现, 明显的表现. The symptoms are a clear manifestation of disease. 这些症状是疾病的明显表现。

quiz.question: __________ deforestation
quiz.explanation: 森林砍伐, 雨林砍伐. Rainforest deforestation threatens biodiversity. 雨林砍伐威胁生物多样性。

quiz.question: _____ __ gustation
quiz.explanation: 味觉, 味觉. The illness affected her sense of gustation. 疾病影响了她的味觉。

quiz.question: _______ incrustation
quiz.explanation: 结壳, 钙结壳. The pipes showed calcium incrustation buildup. 管道显示出钙结壳积聚。

quiz.question: ____ salutation
quiz.explanation: 问候, 热情的问候. He greeted us with a warm salutation. 他用热情的问候迎接我们。

quiz.question: ____ reputation
quiz.explanation: 声誉, 良好的声誉. The company maintained a good reputation. 公司保持了良好的声誉。

quiz.question: _____ imputation
quiz.explanation: 归咎, 虚假的归咎. He rejected the false imputation of guilt. 他拒绝了对罪行的虚假归咎。

quiz.question: ___________ evaluation
quiz.explanation: 评估, 绩效评估. Employees receive annual performance evaluation. 员工接受年度绩效评估。

quiz.question: ______ continuation
quiz.explanation: 继续, 系列继续. Fans eagerly awaited the series continuation. 粉丝急切地等待系列继续。

quiz.question: _____ ___ equation
quiz.explanation: 方程, 解方程. Students learned to solve the equation. 学生学会了解方程。

quiz.question: _____ infatuation
quiz.explanation: 迷恋, 短暂的迷恋. His attraction was merely a brief infatuation. 他的吸引只是短暂的迷恋。

quiz.question: ____ derivation
quiz.explanation: 派生, 词源派生. The dictionary explains word derivation. 字典解释词源派生。

quiz.question: privation ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 贫困, 贫困与匮乏. The refugees endured privation and want. 难民忍受贫困与匮乏。

quiz.question: _____ deprivation
quiz.explanation: 剥夺, 睡眠剥夺. Sleep deprivation affects health negatively. 睡眠剥夺对健康有负面影响。

quiz.question: ________ ovation
quiz.explanation: 热烈鼓掌, 起立鼓掌. The performance received a standing ovation. 表演获得了起立鼓掌。

quiz.question: ____ innovation
quiz.explanation: 创新, 技术创新. Silicon Valley drives tech innovation. 硅谷推动技术创新。

quiz.question: relaxation ____
quiz.explanation: 放松, 放松时间. Everyone needs relaxation time. 每个人都需要放松时间。

quiz.question: ___________ annexation
quiz.explanation: 吞并, 领土吞并. The war resulted in territorial annexation. 战争导致了领土吞并。

quiz.question: _____ vexation
quiz.explanation: 烦恼, 日常烦恼. She dealt with daily vexation calmly. 她平静地处理日常烦恼。

quiz.question: ______________ centralization
quiz.explanation: 集中化, 行政集中化. The reform increased administrative centralization. 改革增加了行政集中化。

quiz.question: ____ optimization
quiz.explanation: 优化, 代码优化. Developers focused on code optimization. 开发人员专注于代码优化。

quiz.question: characterization ___
quiz.explanation: 人物塑造, 人物塑造弧. The novel featured strong characterization arc. 小说有很强的人物塑造弧。

quiz.question: _______ authorization
quiz.explanation: 授权, 书面授权. The transaction requires written authorization. 交易需要书面授权。

quiz.question: vaporization ____
quiz.explanation: 汽化, 汽化率. Temperature affects vaporization rate. 温度影响汽化率。

quiz.question: ________ sensitization
quiz.explanation: 致敏, 过敏原致敏. Exposure causes allergen sensitization. 暴露导致过敏原致敏。

quiz.question: _____ faction
quiz.explanation: 派系, 党内派系. A radical party faction emerged. 一个激进的党内派系出现了。

quiz.question: ____ rarefaction
quiz.explanation: 稀疏, 波的稀疏. Sound waves create wave rarefaction. 声波产生波的稀疏。

quiz.question: _____ __ olfaction
quiz.explanation: 嗅觉, 嗅觉. Dogs have an acute sense of olfaction. 狗有敏锐的嗅觉。

quiz.question: ______ interaction
quiz.explanation: 互动, 社交互动. Children learn through social interaction. 儿童通过社交互动学习。

quiz.question: ______ fraction
quiz.explanation: 分数, 真分数. A proper fraction is less than one. 真分数小于一。

quiz.question: _____ refraction
quiz.explanation: 折射, 光折射. Prisms demonstrate light refraction. 棱镜展示光折射。

quiz.question: _______ infraction
quiz.explanation: 违规, 交通违规. He received a fine for traffic infraction. 他因交通违规收到罚款。

quiz.question: ______ detraction
quiz.explanation: 贬损, 不公平的贬损. His success suffered unfair detraction. 他的成功遭受不公平的贬损。

quiz.question: ____ affection
quiz.explanation: 感情, 表现感情. Parents show affection to their children. 父母对孩子表现感情。

quiz.question: _________ infection
quiz.explanation: 感染, 细菌感染. Antibiotics treat bacterial infection. 抗生素治疗细菌感染。

quiz.question: ___ _______ injection
quiz.explanation: 注射, 流感疫苗注射. She received her annual flu vaccine injection. 她接受了年度流感疫苗注射。

quiz.question: _____ projection
quiz.explanation: 预测, 销售预测. The company revised its sales projection. 公司修改了销售预测。

quiz.question: ______ interjection
quiz.explanation: 插话, 突然的插话. His sudden interjection surprised everyone. 他突然的插话让所有人惊讶。

quiz.question: predilection ___
quiz.explanation: 偏好, 偏好于. She has a predilection for classical music. 她对古典音乐有偏好。

quiz.question: _____ collection
quiz.explanation: 收藏, 邮票收藏. His stamp collection is quite valuable. 他的邮票收藏非常有价值。

quiz.question: ______ inspection
quiz.explanation: 检查, 安全检查. Buildings undergo regular safety inspection. 建筑物定期接受安全检查。

quiz.question: _____ insurrection
quiz.explanation: 叛乱, 武装叛乱. The military crushed the armed insurrection. 军队镇压了武装叛乱。

quiz.question: ____ dissection
quiz.explanation: 解剖, 青蛙解剖. Biology students performed frog dissection. 生物学学生进行了青蛙解剖。

quiz.question: _____ detection
quiz.explanation: 检测, 欺诈检测. Banks use algorithms for fraud detection. 银行使用算法进行欺诈检测。

quiz.question: _____ _ malediction
quiz.explanation: 诅咒, 说诅咒. The witch would speak a malediction. 女巫会说诅咒。

quiz.question: ________ valediction
quiz.explanation: 告别辞, 告别辞. The speaker offered a farewell valediction. 演讲者献上了告别辞。

quiz.question: ____ benediction
quiz.explanation: 祝福, 给予祝福. The priest would give benediction to worshippers. 神父会给信徒祝福。

quiz.question: _____ jurisdiction
quiz.explanation: 管辖权, 法院管辖权. The case fell under court jurisdiction. 该案件属于法院管辖权。

quiz.question: dereliction __ ____
quiz.explanation: 失职, 失职. The officer was charged with dereliction of duty. 该军官被指控失职。

quiz.question: _______ infliction
quiz.explanation: 施加, 痛苦的施加. The punishment was a painful infliction. 惩罚是痛苦的施加。

quiz.question: ______ friction
quiz.explanation: 摩擦, 社会摩擦. The policy caused social friction. 该政策引起了社会摩擦。

quiz.question: ______ eviction
quiz.explanation: 驱逐, 强制驱逐. Tenants faced forced eviction. 租户面临强制驱逐。

quiz.question: ________ conviction
quiz.explanation: 定罪, 刑事定罪. The trial resulted in criminal conviction. 审判导致了刑事定罪。

quiz.question: ____ sanction
quiz.explanation: 制裁, 寻求制裁. Nations agreed to seek sanction. 各国同意寻求制裁。

quiz.question: ____ distinction
quiz.explanation: 荣誉, 高荣誉. She graduated with high distinction. 她以高荣誉毕业。

quiz.question: ______ malfunction
quiz.explanation: 故障, 系统故障. A system malfunction caused delays. 系统故障导致延误。

quiz.question: ____ junction
quiz.explanation: 交叉口, 道路交叉口. Turn left at the road junction. 在道路交叉口左转。

quiz.question: _____ injunction
quiz.explanation: 禁令, 法院禁令. The judge issued a court injunction. 法官发布了法院禁令。

quiz.question: conjunction __ ______
quiz.explanation: 结合, 事件的结合. The success was a conjunction of events. 成功是事件的结合。

quiz.question: _______ disjunction
quiz.explanation: 分离, 逻辑分离. The argument showed logical disjunction. 论证显示出逻辑分离。

quiz.question: _____ __ compunction
quiz.explanation: 内疚, 内疚的刺痛. He felt no sting of compunction. 他没有感到内疚的刺痛。

quiz.question: ________ induction
quiz.explanation: 感应, 磁感应. The motor uses magnetic induction. 电机使用磁感应。

quiz.question: _______ obstruction
quiz.explanation: 阻塞, 交通阻塞. The accident caused traffic obstruction. 事故造成了交通阻塞。

quiz.question: accretion ____
quiz.explanation: 吸积, 吸积盘. Black holes have an accretion disk. 黑洞有吸积盘。

quiz.question: ________ discretion
quiz.explanation: 判断力, 运用判断力. Judges must exercise discretion. 法官必须运用判断力。

quiz.question: __ addition
quiz.explanation: 此外, 此外. In addition, we need more funding. 此外,我们需要更多资金。

quiz.question: ______ sedition
quiz.explanation: 煽动叛乱, 煽动叛乱. The rebel leaders were charged with commit sedition. 叛乱领导人被控煽动叛乱。

quiz.question: _________ coalition
quiz.explanation: 联盟, 政治联盟. Several parties formed a political coalition. 几个政党组成了政治联盟。

quiz.question: abolition ________
quiz.explanation: 废除, 废除运动. The abolition movement fought against slavery. 废除运动反对奴隶制。

quiz.question: ________ demolition
quiz.explanation: 拆除, 建筑拆除. The building demolition took weeks. 建筑拆除花了数周时间。

quiz.question: ____ volition
quiz.explanation: 意志, 自由意志. He acted of his own free volition. 他出于自己的自由意志行事。

quiz.question: _____ munitions
quiz.explanation: 军火, 储存军火. The army needed to store munitions safely. 军队需要安全储存军火。

quiz.question: _________ contrition
quiz.explanation: 悔恨, 真诚的悔恨. He expressed heartfelt contrition for his actions. 他对自己的行为表达了真诚的悔恨。

quiz.question: _______ attrition
quiz.explanation: 消耗, 自然消耗. Staff declined through natural attrition. 员工通过自然消耗减少。

quiz.question: _____ nutrition
quiz.explanation: 营养, 儿童营养. Proper child nutrition is essential. 适当的儿童营养至关重要。

quiz.question: _______ parturition
quiz.explanation: 分娩, 自然分娩. The mother chose natural parturition. 母亲选择了自然分娩。

quiz.question: _________ disquisition
quiz.explanation: 专题论文, 学术专题论文. The professor wrote a scholarly disquisition. 教授写了一篇学术专题论文。

quiz.question: _______ deposition
quiz.explanation: 证词, 证人证词. The lawyer took the witness deposition. 律师采取了证人证词。

quiz.question: ______ preposition
quiz.explanation: 介词, 介词宾语. The noun is an object preposition. 这个名词是介词宾语。

quiz.question: _______ decomposition
quiz.explanation: 分解, 有机分解. Bacteria aid organic decomposition. 细菌帮助有机分解。

quiz.question: ____ _ proposition
quiz.explanation: 提议, 提出提议. The investor will make a proposition. 投资者将提出提议。

quiz.question: ______ presupposition
quiz.explanation: 预设, 隐藏的预设. The argument contains a hidden presupposition. 论证包含隐藏的预设。

quiz.question: _____ disposition
quiz.explanation: 性情, 开朗的性情. She has a naturally sunny disposition. 她天生有开朗的性情。

quiz.question: _______ predisposition
quiz.explanation: 倾向, 遗传倾向. Some diseases have genetic predisposition. 一些疾病有遗传倾向。

quiz.question: _____ exposition
quiz.explanation: 展览会, 贸易展览会. Vendors gathered at the trade exposition. 供应商聚集在贸易展览会。

quiz.question: partition ____
quiz.explanation: 隔断, 隔断墙. They installed a partition wall in the office. 他们在办公室安装了隔断墙。

quiz.question: ___ superstition
quiz.explanation: 迷信, 古老的迷信. The villagers clung to old superstition. 村民坚持古老的迷信。

quiz.question: ____ __ fruition
quiz.explanation: 实现, 实现. The plans finally come to fruition. 计划终于实现了。

quiz.question: ______ intuition
quiz.explanation: 直觉, 女性直觉. She relied on her female intuition. 她依靠她的女性直觉。
